titleInfo.title: Détenu à la geôle de la paroisse St-Jean-Baptiste

mods.abstract: Détenu à la geôle de la paroisse St-Jean-Baptiste, les nègres: PATRICK HENRY, àgé de 30 ansmeaurant 5 pieds 11 pouces; ANDERSON, 26 ans, 5 pieds 2 pouces; TOMB, 30 ans, 5 pieds 3 pouces; ROBERT, 26 ans, 5 pieds 9 pouces; et PAULIN, 18 ans, 4 pieds 9 poucesTous cinq disent appartenir à MFrançois Margonaux, de la paroisse Plaquemines, et parlent l'anglais sculementLe propriétaire est requis de réclamer ses nègres conformément à la loiURSIN JACOB, shérifParoisse St-Jean-Baptiste, 21 juin 1862Detained in the Parish jail of StJohn the Baptist the negroes: PATRICK HENRY, 30 years old, 5 feet 11 inches high; ANDERSON, 26 years, 5 feet 2 inches; TOMB, 30 years, 5 feet 3 inches; ROBERT, 26 years, 5 feet 9 inches; And PAULIN, 18 years, 4 feet 9 inchesAll saying they belong to MrFrançois Margonaux, of the paarish of PlaqueminesThe owner is requested to claim his property according to lawUJACOB, sheriffStJohn the Baptist, June 21st, 1862.
mods.note: Patrick Henry (30); Anderson (26); Tomb (30); Robert (26); Paulin (18)
Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
